lessons.title: Introduction to SQL
lessons.description: Learn the basics of SQL and database concepts
lessons.content: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational databases...

lessons.title: SELECT Statements
lessons.description: Master the art of querying data
lessons.content: The SELECT statement is used to query and retrieve data from a database...

lessons.title: Filtering Data
lessons.description: Use WHERE clauses to filter results
lessons.content: The WHERE clause is used to filter records and extract only those that fulfill a specified condition...

lessons.title: Sorting Results
lessons.description: Order your data with ORDER BY
lessons.content: The ORDER BY keyword is used to sort the result set in ascending or descending order...

lessons.title: JOIN Operations
lessons.content: JOIN clauses are used to combine rows from two or more tables based on a related column...

lessons.title: Aggregate Functions
lessons.content: Aggregate functions perform calculations on a set of values and return a single value...

questions.question: What does SQL stand for?
questions.explanation: SQL stands for Structured Query Language, which is used to manage and query relational databases.

questions.question: Which statement is used to retrieve data?
questions.explanation: The SELECT statement is the primary command used to retrieve data from a database.
